thread.title: Arcade Fire to play Castlefield Bowl as part of Manchester International Festival 2017 - tickets and pre-sale info
thread.title_full: Arcade Fire to play Castlefield Bowl as part of Manchester International Festival 2017 - tickets and pre-sale info

author: Simon Binns
title: Arcade Fire to play Castlefield Bowl as part of Manchester International Festival 2017 - tickets and pre-sale info
text:
QUITE A SPECTACLE: Arcade Fire Share Get What's On updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Arcade Fire will play a summer gig at Manchester's Castlefield Bowl as part of Manchester International Festival 2017 . 
The headline show, on Thursday 6 July, is part of Sounds of the City and will be their first in Manchester for six years. 
2017 marks a major live return for the band with European festival appearances this year such as Spain’s Primavera and Denmark’s Roskilde festival. Tickets go on sale 9am Fri 17 February from www.Gigsandtours.com , www.ticketmaster.co.uk and www.ticketline.co.uk . MIF Members get a 24-hour presale for this and all MIF17 events. Visit http://mif.co.uk/join-support-us/membership/ to find out more. The full MIF17 programme will be announced on Thursday 9 March. Arcade Fire 
In the past four years, Sounds Of The City has become a staple part of the Manchester music scene. Along with Arcade Fire, some of the most acclaimed live artists including Richard Ashcroft, Haçienda Classical, The Levellers and The Waterboys, James, and Blossoms will all headline outdoor shows at Castlefield Bowl this summer.
